name: Mutant Mango Mayhem v0.1
description:
Mutated mangos are infesting your factory!  Learn the pattern of the conveyor belts so you can anticipate where the mutant mangos are going to end up where you can grab them.

For some reason I was getting an error trying to create a Windows build, so here's a version you can play in the browser, I guess.  I'll keep trying to do a Windows build and see if I can get one later...

There'll be more about the making of this game (and about my other projects) on my gamedev blog at kamawale.net .  (I say "there'll be more" because at the time I'm writing this description I haven't made a post there about it yet, because I've been busy making the game, but... I will.)
